attributes.action: Sack Alan Johnson for effectively forcing Proff Nutt to resign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alan Johnson should be sacked.As the government should not be able to choose the advice they want to take, on the basis that it falls in line with their policies!!!
His behaviour and disrespect he shows to the scientific community is deplorable.It makes a mockery of the government.

rejection.details:
There is still currently an active petition on the site requesting the sacking of Alan Johnson:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/JOHNSON/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
